attributes.action: Rafael Benitez should shave his beard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rafael Benítez Maudes  was born April 16, 1960 in Madrid, Spain. 
Known as "Rafa" he has been the manager of Liverpool F.C. since June 2004.

A brilliant manager with an illustrious track record Rafael Benitez has taken Liverpool FC into Premiership contention.

IN August 2007 Mr Benitez started the Premier League Season 2007/2008 sporting a "goatee" beard. Never has a manager won the EPL or English championship whilst follicles of hair have been budding in the facial region. We call upon ALL members of the public to convince Mr Benitez to shave his beard

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
